unnormalised: ## Fintech Funnies: Tumchem UPI Fail Zata Ani Her First World (Indian) Problema
normalised: ## Fintech Funnies: When Your U-P-I Fails and Other First World (Indian) Problems

unnormalised: Okay, lokanno, aami khorem sangum. Aami Bharatiyaank tech khupe avadta, khas korun duddu samballche vellar. Aami Fintech-ak ek lamb-vellchea chaiwala mellnache bhaxen apnnailam - ushno, utsahik ani thoddo avyavasthit. Mhaka dista, konnani Paytimgelyan tanchea sthanik panipuri veparak duddu dilem mhunn sangonk na? Tem atam cricket ani Bollywood-ache remakevishayan vad kortat tenkuy sarkhem rastriy khel zalam.
normalised: Borem, lokanno, satya sanguya. Ami Bharotiyank amchea tech-ache vishesh prem asa, khas karun dublle samballpache vishayant. Ami Fintech-ak eka lamb vellar thavn visrun gelea chaiwala punermilan bhaxen apnnaile - ushnn, utsahak ani thode bhoglant. Mhaka dista, konnem P-a-y-t-m-acho vapar korun aplea sthanik panipuri vikreat dublle divpache garv kaddunk na? Tem atam praktically ek rashtriya khell zala, cricket ani Bollywood remake-ache vishayat vad korpache barabor.

unnormalised: Punn hem soglem smooth asta mhunn dhong korinaka, kaim? Kiteak mhonnlear kadhitari, Fintech ami bhartiyank khas curveball-am martat, tum sodleary tum te bandhun korunk shaktat na. Tum remote kaddun gheunk vota punn tumchea aai-n tichem dischem *saas-bahu* drama koronk gheun gelim mhunn vichar kortat.
normalised: Punn ami te soglem sarem zata mhunn natak korunk favona, kiteak Fintech kaddeak amcher bhirant dita ji itli unique Indian asa ki tum tichem nirman korunchena tum prayatna kel'leari. Tech-ache tulnek ti kshan mhunn tharau zannen tum remote-acho vapar kortat, punn tumchi avoi apleak dainik dose *saas-bahu* dramak lagun tichem hatak gheun gheleli asa.

unnormalised: Dreaded UPI failurovichem udharonn gheunka. Tum D-Mart-ant linent ube asat, Maggi-chem te last packet gheunk sodunk (kiteak mhonnlear adulting sakht zalam, okay?). Tum QR code-ak scan kortat, tumcho magical PIN bhortat, ani tea uprant… doom-achem chakrun firunk suru zata. "Transaction Failed. Please try again." Tumchea hatak gham yeta, tumchem anxiety level vatt’ta, ani cashier tumcher “khorem, bhava?” mhunn tankunk lagta. Maggi-chem cost: Rs. 45. Stress level: Anmol.
normalised: U-P-I failure-ache bhayant ghevun gheya, udaharnnak. Tum D-M-a-r-t-an line-ant ube asa, dukhant Maggi-acho aakhri packet vikte (kiteak adulting kathinn asa, bara bara?). Tum Q-R code scan kortat, tumchea magic P-I-N-ant poddut, ani magir... doom-ache chakri phirunk lagta. "Transaction Failed. Please try again." Tumchea hatak gham yetat, tumchea chintak-che level skyrocket zata, ani cashier tumcho "really, bro?" mhunn disunk lagta. Maggi-ache dublle: rupees forty five. Stress-ache level: Amuly.

unnormalised: Ani OTP saga-i asa. Tum Netbanking vaprun duddu transfer korunk sodhtat (kiteak mhonnlear tum fancy mhunn bhogtat?), ani OTP yetalek lagbhag 2 business dis lagtat. Tem inbox-ant yetalek, tum kitem korunk sodhtaley tum visrun geltat. Tem tumchea bhavachea zolmdisache bhentak astalem? 25/07/2024-ak due aslele monthly broadband bill? Vo Flipkart-antlem cool gadget gheunk? Konnak khobor? OTP-ak khobor asa. Ani to sangona.
normalised: Magir O-T-P saga asa. Tum Netbanking-acho vapar korun funds transfer korpak prayatna kortat (kiteak tum fancy vata mhunn dista?), ani O-T-P lagbhag don vyapar divas gheun yetta. Te soglem tumchea inbox-ant yeta ten'na tum visrun gelea kiteak tum korpak prayatna kortale. Tem tumchea bhav-bhinnak-ache zolmachi bhet asli? Maasik broadband bill je twenty fifth july don hazar ani visa char-ak zai aslem? Vaa matren F-l-i-p-k-a-r-t thavn te cool gadget impuls-buying? Konn zanna? O-T-P zanna. Ani tem sangona.

unnormalised: Multiple Fintech apps navigate korpachem sukh visrunka naka. PhonePe, Google Pay, BharatPe… hem ek kelkannin soko naselhem alphabet soup asat. Tumhak yaad dovrunk podtta konnache app tumchea linked bank accounts asa, konn tumhak uttam cashback offers dita (tumchea next Swiggy ordercher Rs. 10 off!), ani konn tumcho Uncle Sharma tumhak Diwali-cher "shagun" duddu dhaddta(₹501, tachem bhala korum). Hem mental workout, mhunn hanv tumhak sangtam.
normalised: Ami multiple Fintech apps-acho marg darunk nasuya. P-h-o-n-e-P-e, G-o-o-g-l-e P-a-y, B-h-a-r-a-t-P-e...tem koinch naslelem payment options-achem alphabet soup asa. Tumcher ugddas dovrunk poddta konn app-an tumchea linked bank accounts asat, konn-an tumche best cashback offers dita (rupees don sarko tumchea S-w-i-g-g-y order-ar!), ani konn tumchea priye uncle Sharma tumcher Diwali-ar "shagun" dublle dhaddunk vaparta (rupees panch se ani ek, tachen bhale). Ek manasik sarav asa, mhaka sangta.

unnormalised: Ani chukon konnakui wrong duddu dhaddche bhirant asta? Tum tumchea auto-rickshaw driver Raju-kak Rs. 200 dhaddunk sodhtat, punn tumchea clumsy hatak ek wrong digit yeta. Dusrea vorak tum Mukesh Ambani-kak tacho monthly Jio recharge korun dilem. Awkward. Khupegem awkward.
normalised: Ani chukun konn-nakai dublle patthoupachi bhirant? Tum tumchea auto-rickshaw driver Raju-ak rupees don se patthoupak prayatna kortat, punn tumchea clumsy angulam ek chukichem anka poddta. Dusreant tum jio recharge-ak lagun Mukesh Ambani-ak massik poddut bhugtan kele. Awkward. Bare awkward.

unnormalised: Punn are, sogle glitch ani kadhitari heart attack asta punn aami Fintech-ak avdtat. Tem convenient, tem (mostly) reliable, ani duddu gheun voiche kashta bhair korta. Tanchevishayan vinodi bhav dhovrunk yad dovrunk. Kiteak mhonnlear soglem zata uprant, fail zata tea UPI transaction thoddem dukhi korta punn tem Indian Fintech-achea khuxechea, avyavasthit, ani khupe majjechea sonvsarant ek vaddo disun yetana.
normalised: Punn hey, soglem glitches ani kaddeak heart attacks asleari, ami amchea Fintech-ak azun pasun prem kortat. Tem suvidajanak asa, tem (mostly) vishvas divpachem asa, ani tem ami wad-an dublle gheun phirpache tras soddoun dita. Matren ek vinodyan ubharun dovrunk ugddas dovrat. Soglem vishayant ek fail zalea U-P-I transaction matren ek lahan dukh Bharoti Fintech-ache mahima, bhoglan ani uttejak jagant.
